member.name: REASON_CONTEXT
member.summary: Contains information about a power request. This structure is used by the and functions.

member.name: REASON_CONTEXT.Version
member.summary: The version number of the structure. This parameter must be set toPOWER_REQUEST_CONTEXT_VERSION.

summary.para: The format of the reason for the power request. This parameter can be one of the following values:

listheader.description: The Detailed structure identifies a localizable string resource that describes the reason for the power request.
The SimpleReasonString parameter contains a simple, non-localizable string that describes the reason for the power request.

member.name: REASON_CONTEXT.Reason
member.summary: A union that consists of either a Detailed structure or a string.

member.name: REASON_CONTEXT.Reason.Detailed
member.summary: A structure that identifies a localizable string resource to describe the reason for the power request.

member.name: REASON_CONTEXT.Reason.Detailed.LocalizedReasonModule
member.summary: The module that contains the string resource.

member.name: REASON_CONTEXT.Reason.Detailed.LocalizedReasonId
member.summary: The ID of the string resource.

member.name: REASON_CONTEXT.Reason.Detailed.ReasonStringCount
member.summary: The number of strings in the ReasonStrings parameter.

member.name: REASON_CONTEXT.Reason.Detailed.ReasonStrings
member.summary: An array of strings to be substituted in the string resource at run time.

member.name: REASON_CONTEXT.Reason.SimpleReasonString
member.summary: A non-localized string that describes the reason for the power request.
